About Me

Let me tell you about my self

Bio

I am a self-driven Software Engineer that is passionate about creating world-class software products and leading highly effective teams. I hold a First Class honors Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Makerere University.

I value teamwork and love to be a resourceful addition to any team I join. I also enjoy contributing ideas to improving team delivery and customer satisfaction.

Andela Uganda (2018 - Present)

Software Engineer

Andela builds distributed engineering teams with Africa's most talented software developers.

Through out my time in Andela, I have been able to contribute to building a number of products both as a Frontend and as a Fullstack developer. These products include

  • Andela Eats - A meals management Application) [Post Apprenticeship]
  • Converge - A meeting room management application [Apprenticeship]
  • Authors Haven - A blogging platform [Simulations]
  • Ride My Way - A car pooling application [BootCamp]

Technologies Used

  • Python - Django, Flask
  • Javascript - React

Leadership postiions held

  • 2019 Learning facilitator for Andela Kigali Bootcamp
  • 2018 Andela Senate representative
  • 2018 Women in tech facilitator Andela Uganda

WIMEA ICT (2018)

Software Engineering Intern

WIMEA-ICT is a project under Makerere University whose aim is to automate weather stations in East Africa.

Our team was tasked to develop a TCP Listner and a dashboard that provides visualizations for the status of different weather sensors.

On the team I focused on designing of the dashboard

Technologies Used

  • PHP - Laravel
  • Javascript - DyGraphs

Eight Tech Consults (2017-2018)

Web & Mobile Student Intern

I joined this organisation as a Student intern. My work at this organisation was remarkable to an extent that I got retian after serving them for a period of 3 months.

With in this organisation I was responsible to building web and mobile applications under the suppervision of a senoir developer.

Products Contributed to

  • URES - A results management Application for higher institutes
  • Cassava Web & App, - An application to registration and andvisory services for cassava farmers
Technologies Used
  • PHP - Laravel, Code Igniter
  • Java - Android
  • Javascript

Kibsys Techs (2016 - Present)

Co-founder and Developer

During one of those random meetings in a friends room, we came up with an idea of extending our awsome skills to people around us. We begun telling every one, classmates, friends and family that we were offering our skills. And this is how kibsys was born

Products Contributed to

  • Mubali web & App - a music streaming platform for ugandan music
  • Farmers App - a mobile app showcasing diseases and practices
  • Pictura App - a mobile app for sharing photos
